label: 本佐録
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: A representative example of the political thought of the seventeenth century, ...said to be the work of the influential bakufu vassal Honda Masanobu.  [It] uses the conceptual framework of works like the Kana seiri but is noted for its discussion of various concrete political issues (p. 406). [本田正信、仮名性理]
